meanings.definition: Capable of killing or destroying trichomonas.
meanings.sent1: The trichomonacidal medication helped eliminate the harmful parasites.
meanings.sent2: The trichomonacidal spray effectively eradicated the trichomonas infection.
meanings.sent3: The trichomonacidal shampoo made the tiny organisms vanish like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her trichomonacidal powers were like a superhero defeating the evil trichomonas villains.
meanings.sent5: The trichomonacidal treatment was so powerful, it wiped out the trichomonas completely.

meanings.definition: A substance or treatment that is effective against trichomonas.
meanings.sent1: She administered the trichomonacidal to combat the trichomonas infection.
meanings.sent2: The trichomonacidal proved to be the best solution for treating trichomonas.
meanings.sent3: The trichomonacidal was like a shield protecting against the trichomonas invasion.
meanings.sent4: The trichomonacidal acted as a warrior fighting off the trichomonas threat.
meanings.sent5: With the trichomonacidal, the trichomonas had no chance of survival.
